summary: CSS variables are *really* cool, and they're incredibly powerful when it comes to React.  This tutorial shows how we can use them with React to create dynamic themes.  We'll see how to get the most out of CSS-in-JS tools like styled-components, and how our mental frame around media queries has been wrong all along
title: CSS Variables for React Devs
